alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:04PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Utah, Eastern Uinta Basin. In Colorado, Lower Yampa River Basin and Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could become very difficult. Expect slick and snowy roads. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
